description: Latin Pegasus (“mythical white winged stallion of Medusa and Poseidon”)

entries.meaning: (zoology) Any member of the family Pegasidae.

description: Named for the first exosolar planet 51 Pegasi b that was discovered, in the constellation Pegasus.

entries.meaning: (planetology) An exosolar planet whose characteristics are similar to Jupiter, but which orbits its parent star much more closely and thus has higher temperatures.
